Translations.Text: is kitaab (ke Allah ki kitaab hone) mein koyi shak nahi, parhezgaaro1 ko raah dikhaane wali hai
jo log ghayb par imaan laate hai aur namaaz ko qayem rakhte hai aur hamaare diye hoye (maal) mein se qarch karte hai
aur jo log imaan laate hai us par jo aap ki taraf utaara gaya aur jo aap se pehle utaara gaya aur wo aaqirath par bhi yaqeen rakhte hai
yahi log apne rub ki taraf se hidaayath par hai aur yahi log falaah aur najaath paane wale hai
